text: The Syro-Malabar Catholic Eparchy of Gorakhpur is an Eastern Catholic eparchy in India, under the Syro-Malabar Catholic Church. It was erected by Pope John Paul II in 1984 through the Bull "Ex quo Divinum Concilium". Mar Thomas Thuruthimattam, CST was appointed bishop of Gorakhpur on 15 July 2006. He was ordained bishop on 1 October 2006 and assumed office on the same day. ==Former bishops== *Mar Dominic Kokkatt ==References== ==External links== * Syro- Malabar Catholic Diocese of Gorakhpur * Syro-Malabar Catholic Diocese of Gorakhpur at Catholic-Hierarchy Category:Syro-Malabar Catholic dioceses Category:Christian organizations established in 1984 Category:Gorakhpur Category:1984 establishments in India Category:Christianity in Uttar Pradesh
title: Syro-Malabar Catholic Eparchy of Gorakhpur
